channel.title: How do i add ::home, ::train, ::minigame teles 317
channel.description: Ok i have been working on a server but, i dont understand the concept of adding teles to the mage book section or if its simpilier to do we can just add it to the emotes section i have no idea wat 2 do. so if u got any ideas thank u

item.title: How do i add ::home, ::train, ::minigame teles 317
item.dc:creator: @aces610 aces610
item.description:
@aces610 wrote:

i have this is the client.java in my source file } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Svew
} else {
teleportToX = 2852;
teleportToY = 2953;
sendMessage(“You teleport to Home.”);
} i change my teleportox = that and y and 2 that and it dont change my ::home command after that i did comile it also it just redierects me to the normal home…[quote=“Anieli, post:2, topic:337708”]Not sure how you would add teles into the mage book or emotes section sorry but to add a command such as ::home then you could use:

if(command.startsWith(“home”)){
triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

That should work once you ajust the co ordinates to which ever ones you like. Not sure if the brightness thing is needed but it was there so i left it in for the sake of it.

If you wanted to make a command to take you to a staff only area you could do:

if(command.startsWith(“modzone”) && playerRights >= 1){
triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0);
}

Hope that helps[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: How do i add ::home, ::train, ::minigame teles 317
item.dc:creator: @Anieli Anieli
item.description:
@Anieli wrote:

Not sure how you would add teles into the mage book or emotes section sorry but to add a command such as ::home then you could use:

if(command.startsWith(“home”)){
triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

That should work once you ajust the co ordinates to which ever ones you like. Not sure if the brightness thing is needed but it was there so i left it in for the sake of it.

If you wanted to make a command to take you to a staff only area you could do:

if(command.startsWith(“modzone”) && playerRights >= 1){
triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0);
}

Hope that helps

Read full topic
